notes: Session completed FR-004 and NFR-003: implemented MapAPIError() in errors.go to map Vertex AI errors to custom types, and logLLMError() in bot.go for structured ERROR logging. Fixed genai.APIError type assertion (value type, not pointer). Next session should implement NFR-001: add configurable timeout context for LLM calls in bot.go (currently uses context.Background() without timeout). Requirements: (1) Add LLM_TIMEOUT_SECONDS env var with default 30s, (2) Use context.WithTimeout in HandleWebhook before calling GenerateText, (3) Add tests for timeout behavior.
